name: My Stick Life
description:
Can you survive in this dangerous craft world?
If you want to live in this stick world, you should learn to hunt the sheep to get meat and pick apples as supply, avoid the dangerous monsters, collect different materials, study formulas of the necessity goods, make any things you may need with the resources you collect, use weapons to fend off the enemies… Do you have the determination to survive your stick life?

Explore the craft world, collect various unlimited materials and resources and build everything from weapons to furniture.
Learn to create, explore and survive in My Stick Life.


Features:
-Unlimited resources for crafting.
-Amazing graphics.
-Various formula for collecting.
-Free and relaxing.
-Creative stick life.
